element.name: TfpgHyperlink
element.short: TfpgCustomLabel derived class implements a hyperlink.
element.descr: This is a class to implement a hyperlink. Of course, such as all the other fpGUI components it is cross platform Windows, Linux but its behaviour can be different because the browser call. Under Windows ShellExecute Windows API is used, so you can have in the hyperlink any URL web compliant, that is, not only a typical http:// hyperlink but also a mailto: will work. Under Linux you can have just a tipical http:// hyperlink.

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.URL
element.short: String type property that contains the hyperlink to jump.

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.FontDesc
element.short: Standard font for this component is Arial-8:antialias=true:underline

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.HandleLMouseDown
element.short: This overriden procedure intercepts left mouse keydown, call its inherited method and run GoHyperLink method to jump hyperlink.

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.Autosize
element.short: Its default is True, so the hyperlink width is automatically determined.

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.Text
element.descr: It can be, of course, different from URL and more descriptive about the hyperlink to reach.

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.HotTrackFont
element.short: This property is the type of font when mouse is over the hyperlink

element.name: TfpgHyperlink.HotTrackColor
element.short: Same as HotTrackFont but for TextColor property when the mouse is over the hyperlink.
